howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: We are a strategic design firm. We bring method, product thinking, and speed so every delivery moves the business‚Äînot just the interface. The process is simple and straightforward. Skip meetings and make the most of your time.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.subtitle: Our benefits
benefits.description: Discover the benefits of our service

aboutTheDesigner.title: Who is behind it?
aboutTheDesigner.description: Citrus Designer is a strategic design firm led by Andrea. With 8+ years of experience, I turn ideas into unique and memorable experiences.

items.title: The simpler, the better
items.description: I love breaking down complex problems and, using my analytical approach, turning them into simple, clear, and meaningful designs.

items.title: User-Centered Design
items.description: I dive deep into what people really need and how they act, to create intuitive, useful, and meaningful experiences.

items.title: Coherent Design
items.description: I use consistent patterns and components so that everything makes sense and the user experience is as smooth as possible.

items.title: Continuous Growth
items.description: I am always exploring new trends, tools, and approaches to keep my design fresh, relevant, and constantly evolving.

items.title: Certified in UX/UI
items.description: Backed by cutting-edge and ongoing training.

items.title: Featured in Forbes
items.description: Recognized for my impact and innovation in the digital world.

items.title: Leader of Friends of Figma
items.description: I drive the Figma community to revolutionize collaborative design.

items.title: ADPList Mentor
items.description: I inspire and guide the next generation of talent with passion and experience.

home.orangeMessage: Make the most of your time! With an unlimited subscription, forget about budgets and complications while adding a refreshing touch to your projects.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What clients say about Citrus Designer
testimonials.description: Discover why our clients trust us

items.text: Andrea is a professional who is easy to communicate with and immediately understands what the company is looking for, bringing new ideas and perspectives that are truly enriching.
items.author: Joel Pascual

items.text: From the start we trusted Citrus Designer and the result has been exceptional, receiving great reviews especially regarding the client experience throughout the platform.
items.author: Jagoba Ormaetxea

items.text: Besides being quick and efficient, Citrus Designer quickly understands the few inputs given and from there their creativity emerges to achieve an optimal solution.
items.author: Nacho Kleinman

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: The process is simple and easy. Avoid meetings and make the most of your time.

steps.title: My way of working
steps.secondaryText: From subscription to final delivery, the process is designed to maximize efficiency. Technology handles the operational part, while we focus on creativity and personalized attention for each project.

steps.title: Choose a plan
steps.description: Choose the subscription that best suits your needs

steps.title: Make a request
steps.description: Submit your design request through the portal

howItWorks.limeMessage: We use an innovative model where quality and speed are our priorities. We are the creative team behind every project, working with specialized internal designers.

benefits.title: Proprietary software
benefits.description: Easily manage requests from the internal software

benefits.title: Fast Delivery
benefits.description: We deliver your designs within 24/48 hours

benefits.title: High-quality designs
benefits.description: Senior-level design whenever you need it

benefits.title: Unlimited requests
benefits.description: All the requests you want per month, one request at a time.

beforeAndAfter.title: Discover the magic of change
beforeAndAfter.secondaryText: Explore fictitious examples that demonstrate the impact of our process with high-quality results in a matter of time.

howItWorks.orangeMessage: Make the most of your time! With our unlimited subscription, forget about budgets and complications while adding a refreshing touch to your projects.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that best fits you. No contracts, no stress... you can cancel at any time. Forget about freelancers or hiring an in-house designer.

items.title: Cancel anytime
items.description: No strings attached, you decide when to leave.

items.title: Try it for a week
items.description: If you're not satisfied in the first week, we will refund your money.

items.title: Book a session if you have doubts
items.description: Schedule a personalized session to resolve your questions.

products.title: Pricing Model
products.secondaryText: Choose one of our monthly subscriptions. Start right away without a contract - pause and cancel anytime.

infoBox.title: Still have questions?
infoBox.description: Get in touch with us, we will be happy to answer all your questions :)

items.title: How can I make design requests?
items.answer: Once you subscribe to one of the plans, within your profile there is a section called Requests where you can submit your requests. Remember that you can only have one active at a time until the current request is closed.

items.title: When will I receive the designs?
items.answer: It depends on the complexity of the request; normally you will receive the designs within 2-3 business days.

items.title: Can I change my plan later?
items.answer: Yes, all you have to do is unsubscribe, wait until your current subscription ends, and then subscribe again to the plan of your choice.

items.title: How does billing work?
items.answer: On the first day of your initial subscription and on monthly renewal cycles, you can download the invoice from the Billing tab in your client area.

items.title: Is there a refund policy if I don't like the service?
items.answer: You can try one of our subscriptions for a week and if you're not satisfied with the service, we will refund your money.

contact.title: How can we help you?
contact.description: Choose how you prefer to contact us and we will answer any questions you may have, or if you prefer, book a 20-minute introductory call.

email.title: Send us an email
email.description: Do you have questions or need more information? Write to us and we will respond as soon as possible.

chat.title: Chat with us
chat.description: Prefer something faster? Connect with us in the chat and we'll resolve your doubts immediately.

meeting.title: Book a 1:1
meeting.description: Schedule a personalized session and we will discuss the best solution for your project.

waitlist.title: Join our waitlist
waitlist.description: We want to provide the best service to everyone, so we don't take too many subscriptions at once. Join our waitlist and we will notify you when a spot becomes available on our platform üéâ
waitlist.successDescription: You will soon receive a confirmation email with your current position. If a spot becomes available, we will notify you by email and you will have X days to complete your subscription. If not done within that period, your spot will pass to the next user.

admin.title: Waitlist
admin.emptyDescription: There is no one in the waitlist at this moment. The list will update automatically when someone registers.

company.title: Citrus Designer
company.description: Strategic design firm by subscription. We turn your ideas into exceptional designs that move your business.

banner.title: üçã We use cookies
banner.message: We use our own and third-party cookies to analyze traffic and improve your experience. We also use Facebook marketing cookies to show you relevant ads.

projects.title: Some of my favorite projects
projects.description: From startups to large companies, discover some projects we have collaborated on to transform high-impact visual experiences.

items.title: Competize
items.description: Website redesign to make it more visual and responsive.

items.title: Tenvinilo
items.description: Improved user experience of the purchase process.

items.title: Freakit
items.description: App redesign and new feature design.

items.title: Gureik
items.description: Design of the delivery website for the multi-brand restaurant chain.

projectsSummary.title: Take a look at the most impressive projects

common.title: What's included
common.customPriceDescription: For companies that require much more powerful designs, we have what you need.

designEquivalence.title: Equivalences
designEquivalence.description: As a strategic design firm, we prioritize impact and clarity. At Citrus Designer, we always aim to deliver our designs within 24‚Äì48 hours. However, some requests may take longer due to their complexity. With this in mind, we've prepared this list of project types with approximate estimates. Keep in mind these numbers can vary depending on project complexity, the level of detail required, and the review process.
designEquivalence.callToAction: Need something that's not on this list? Contact us and we'll give you more details!

categories.name: Web Pages
categories.description: Design of interfaces for websites adaptable to different devices, with a focus on user experience, loading speed, and SEO optimization. Includes everything from landing pages to complete corporate websites.

items.title: Design from scratch
items.description: Between 1 and 2 pages per week, starting from a completely new structure and defining the architecture and visual identity from the beginning.

items.title: Redesign
items.description: Between 2 and 3 pages per week, leveraging the pre-existing structure to update the aesthetics and improve the user experience without redoing the entire architecture.

categories.name: Mobile Applications
categories.description: Interface design for native and hybrid applications, considering iOS and Android design guidelines. Includes the design of main screens, navigation flows, and custom interactive components.

items.title: Design from scratch
items.description: Between 3 and 5 screens per week, considering a clear understanding of the project and few revision iterations.

items.title: Redesign
items.description: Between 5 and 7 screens per week, having an established structure and flows that allow for streamlined processes.

categories.name: User Experience
categories.description: The UX design patterns are universal pillars that are used to solve usability problems and allow implementing an intuitive and adaptable design that is continuously optimized through user tracking and testing through prototypes.

items.title: Medium projects
items.description: Between 4 and 6 weeks, including requirements definition, wireframing, and prototyping.

items.title: Complex projects
items.description: Between 10 and 14 weeks, when in-depth research, multiple iterations, and exhaustive usability tests are required.

categories.name: User Flows
categories.description: Detailed design of user journeys within a platform, considering all possible use cases and interface states. Intuitive flow diagrams are created and each interaction is defined to ensure a coherent experience.

items.title: Web flows from scratch (simple)
items.description: Between 1 and 2 complete flows per week.

items.title: Web flows from scratch (moderate)
items.description: Between 0.5-1 flow per week, given the need to define the navigation architecture and validate various interactions.

items.title: Web flow redesigns (simple)
items.description: 2 flows per week, leveraging the existing base structure to update or improve the experience.

items.title: Web flow redesigns (moderate)
items.description: 1 flow per week, combining already defined elements with usability adjustments.

items.title: App flows from scratch (simple)
items.description: 1 flow per week, considering that the definition of interactions and transitions is usually more detailed.

items.title: App flows from scratch (moderate)
items.description: 1 flow per week, having to address various screens and states.

items.title: App flow redesigns (simple)
items.description: Between 1-2 flows per week, as there is a previous base that is improved or modernized.

items.title: App flow redesigns (moderate)
items.description: 1 flow per week, balancing experience updates with validation of new interaction patterns and a comprehensive review of the experience.

categories.name: Information Architecture
categories.description: Organization and structuring of content to facilitate understanding and accessibility. Includes the creation of taxonomies, information hierarchies, site maps, and navigation schemes that optimize how users find and process information.

items.title: Medium projects
items.description: Between 2 and 3 weeks, including content analysis, definition of navigation flows, and prototype development.

items.title: Complex projects
items.description: Between 3-4 weeks, considering user testing and multiple iterations.

categories.name: Design Systems
categories.description: Development of reusable component libraries, style guides, and design patterns that ensure visual and functional consistency across all platforms. Includes detailed documentation and implementation examples for developers.

items.title: Web systems from scratch (medium)
items.description: Between 6 and 8 weeks, with a pace of 2 to 3 components or main sections per week.

items.title: Web systems from scratch (complex)
items.description: Between 10 and 12 weeks or more, to create a complete component library, comprehensive documentation, and adaptation to multiple devices.

items.title: Web system redesigns (simple)
items.description: Between 4 and 6 weeks, leveraging existing elements and patterns to update and unify them.

items.title: Web system redesigns (complex)
items.description: Between 8 and 10 weeks, when a comprehensive review of the style guide and integration of new patterns is required.

items.title: App systems from scratch (simple)
items.description: Between 6 and 8 weeks, considering the definition of mobile-specific components, interactions, and adaptability to different resolutions.

items.title: App systems from scratch (complex)
items.description: Between 10 and 12 weeks, especially if components need to be developed for different platforms (iOS, Android) and comply with their guidelines.

items.title: App system redesigns (simple)
items.description: Between 4 and 6 weeks, updating and unifying key components of an existing system.

items.title: App system redesigns (complex)
items.description: Between 8 and 10 weeks, in cases of complete experience revision and incorporation of new patterns and significant improvements.
